XII.ii.2.C.2.d
.
Action Taken by VA When SSA Returns VA Form 21P-4180
Use the table below to determine the action to take when SSA returns
VA Form 21P-4180
.
If …
Then …
VA Form 21P-4180
, Item 10A, is checked
the special allowance is payable
take adjudicative action on all pending claims, and
when all claims are finalized, transfer the deceased Veteran’s claims folder to the Philadelphia Pension Management Center (PMC) for payment of the special allowance.
Reference
:  For more information on the jurisdiction for payment of the special allowance, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.A.2
.
VA Form 21P-4180
, Item 11A, is checked
the special allowance is
not
payable
add the
VA Form 21P-4180
to the deceased Veteran’s claims folder, and
take no further action.
VA Form 21P-4180
, Item 11B, is checked
send a letter to the surviving spouse advising of possible entitlement at age 60, and
inform the surviving spouse to contact VA at age 60.
Note
:  This does not affect the jurisdiction of the claims folder.
VA Form 21P-4180
, Item 11C, is checked
there is no one eligible to receive Social Security benefits.
Note
:  Take no further action.
Note
:  When the certification of entitlement by SSA is received in an RO and not the Philadelphia PMC, take action as provided in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.A.2.b
.
